articles.title: Asian shares surge as Russia-Ukraine talks buoy sentiment By Reuters - Investing.com
articles.description: Asian shares surge as Russia-Ukraine talks buoy sentiment
articles.content:
By Stella Qiu and Alun John

articles.title: 'I have never seen flames that big in my life': 3 unconscious people rescued from flat in Bedok after PMD fire - AsiaOne

articles.title: Covid-19 can cause brain shrinkage, memory loss: Study - AsiaOne
articles.description: Covid-19 can cause the brain to shrink, reduce grey matter in the regions that control emotion and memory, and damage areas that control the sense of smell, an Oxford University study has found. The scientists said that the effects were even seen in people wh…

articles.title: Barbie Hsu's mother's reaction to the actress marrying former boyfriend: 'I was kept in the dark' - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: When asked if she would meet Hsu's new husband, Huang Chunmei replied, “It all depends if I’m feeling up to it at the time. Whether I want to see him, wait until the time comes, then we’ll talk.”
